name: Bharatiya Janata Party
description: Centre-right party, currently the ruling party at the Centre. Formed in 1980 from the Bharatiya Jana Sangh.

name: Indian National Congress
description: Centre-left party, one of the oldest political parties in the world. Led India's independence movement.

name: Aam Aadmi Party
description: Centre-left party focused on anti-corruption. Grew out of the India Against Corruption movement.

name: All India Trinamool Congress
description: Centre-left regional party, dominant in West Bengal. Founded by Mamata Banerjee after splitting from Congress.

name: Samajwadi Party
description: Centre-left regional party based in Uttar Pradesh. Advocates for social justice and secularism.

name: Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam
description: Centre-left Dravidian party dominant in Tamil Nadu. Advocates for social justice and Tamil identity.
